Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photograph does not actually show Vladimir Putin surrounded by other world leaders.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photograph shows Putin surrounded by other world leaders when he was digitally added to the image.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photograph is genuine and accurately depicts Putin surrounded by other world leaders, which is not the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to acknowledge the alternative explanation that the image was digitally manipulated and does not represent a real event.
